amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Office of Justice Programs Weed and Seed Program by $8.5 million with offsets from the FBI Salaries and Expenses account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 9 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for the Office of Justice Programs Weed and Seed Program by $8.5 million with offsets from the FBI Salaries and Expenses account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rush amendment (A006) Failed by voice vote.
